justification: Telemetry-burst spikes after firmware-v3.18 rollout require adjusting stage3 window.max_skew_ms, watermark.offset_ms, and quorum.min_nodes for stable ingestion.
After firmware-v3.18 removed the jitter dampener causing skew during telemetry-burst events, these settings limit max skew, offset, and enforce quorum.
Mitigates telemetry-burst skew overshoot introduced by firmware-v3.18 by setting stage3 window.max_skew_ms, watermark.offset_ms, and replicator.quorum.min_nodes per appendix C.
